languages.text: [Язвительно улыбнуться] "Поступим с ним так, как поступал он. Отправим его на круг".

traits.locale_text: [Язвительно улыбнуться] "Поступим с ним так, как поступал он. Отправим его на круг".

languages.text: [Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."
languages.original_text: [Язвительно улыбнуться] "Поступим с ним так, как поступал он. Отправим его на круг".

traits.locale_text: [Smile acerbically] "I propose we do by him as he has done by others. Let us throw him for a loop."
[Smile acerbically] "I propose we do by him as he has done by others. Let us throw him for a loop."
[Smile acerbically] "Let's deal with him the way he did. Let us throw him for a loop."
[Smile acerbically] "Let's deal with him the way he did. Let us throw him for a loop."
[Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."
[Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."

languages.text: [露出恶毒的笑容]“就用他对付别人的手段来对付他吧，咱们来把他扔出气闸吧。”
languages.original_text: [Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."

traits.locale_text: [露出恶毒的笑容]“就用他最喜欢的方式来对付他吧，咱们来把他扔出气闸吧。”

languages.text: [不敵な笑みを浮かべる]「彼が人々を使い捨てにしたように、私たちも彼を使い捨てにして、驚かせてやろう」
languages.original_text: [Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."

traits.locale_text: [不敵な笑みを浮かべる]「彼のやり方で対処しよう。混乱させてやる」

languages.text: [Sonreír de forma cruel] «Deshagámonos de él como él se deshacía de la gente: que gire».
languages.original_text: [Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír de forma cruel] «Tratémosle como él nos trató. Dejémosle por los suelos».

languages.text: [Bitter lächeln] "Entsorgen wir ihn, wie er die Leute entsorgt hat. Schicken wir ihn auf einen Spazierflug."
languages.original_text: [Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."

traits.locale_text: [Säuerlich lächeln] "Kümmern wir uns so ihm, wie er es getan hat. Schicken wir ihn auf Spazierflug."

languages.text: [Afficher un sourire acerbe] « Débarrassons-nous de lui comme il le faisait avec ses gens : envoyons-le au rebut. »
languages.original_text: [Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."

traits.locale_text: [Afficher un sourire acerbe] « Appliquons la même méthode qu'il réservait à ses ennemis : envoyons-le au rebut. »

languages.text: [Ters bir tavırla gülümse] "O nasıl insanlara çöp muamelesi yaptıysa biz de aynısını yapalım. Onu çöp gibi atalım."
languages.original_text: [Smile acerbically] "Let us dispose of him as he disposed of people — let us throw him for a loop."

traits.locale_text: [Ters bir tavırla gülümse] "O nasıl insanlara çöp muamelesi yaptıysa, biz de aynısını yapalım. Onu çöp gibi atalım."
